comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
This is El Salto del Agua (Water Leap) fountain, located at Arcos de Belén (which continues as Avenida Chapultepec towards west, where the archade heads to, up to Chapultepec Hill where the water came from) and "T" to San Juan de Letrán (today Eje 1 Lázaro Cárdenas)
 Dr. Roberto Duarte
Plastic Surgeon
